b'3/ r/r is favorable here as there\xe2\x80\x99s a floor on how far this could drop. $BFAM is a dream asset for any of the mega funds at the right price and I\xe2\x80\x99m sure they regret not putting in a pref in March'

b'2/ downside of a prolonged recovery - $bfam still benefits LT as smaller mom/pop daycares close or BFAM can acquire at fire sale prices. \n\nStrong balance sheet helps here in a highly fragmented industry where BFAM has majority share'

b'1/n Favorite \xe2\x80\x9crecovery\xe2\x80\x9d idea going into 2021 is $bfam 

People go back to work - volumes should recover nicely. 

Tailwinds from remote work as parents need childcare while at home + companies will offer more benefits as they fight for talent'
